org.spongepowered.api.event

Interface ExperienceEvent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockBreakEvent, EntityBreakBlockEvent, EntityDeathEvent, HumanBreakBlockEvent, HumanDeathEvent, HumanExpChangeEvent, HumanRetractFishingLineEvent, LivingBreakBlockEvent, LivingDeathEvent, PlayerBreakBlockEvent, PlayerDeathEvent, PlayerExpChangeEvent, PlayerRetractFishingLineEvent

    public interface ExperienceEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getExp()
      Get the experience after an event has been processed.
      void setExp(int exp)
      Set the amount of experience after an event has been processed.

    • Method Detail

      • getExp

        int getExp()
        Get the experience after an event has been processed.
        Returns:
        The experience to receive

      • setExp

        void setExp(int exp)
        Set the amount of experience after an event has been processed. Negative values will remove experience.
        Parameters:
        exp - The experience to give or take
